Unknown.name: MiController
Unknown.summary:
Class for controlling a MiLight WiFi controller box. Must be instantiated by supplying the IP-address of the controller. Commands for specified groups or all lightbulbs can then be sent using the methods for RGB or white lightbulbs.

The controller must be linked to the local WiFi network and lightbulbs must first be linked to groups with the MiLight phone app.

See http://github.com/Milfje/MiControl/wiki for more information.

fields.name: AutoDelay
fields.summary: Set this to 'false' to manually implement a delay between commands. By default, a 50ms 'Thread.Sleep()' is executed between commands to prevent command dropping by the WiFi controller.

constructors.name: MiController(string ip)
constructors.summary: Constructs a new MiLight controller class. Is used for a single MiLight WiFi controller.

params.value: The IP-address of the MiLight WiFi controller

methods.name: Discover()
methods.summary: Broadcasts an UDP message to discover MiLight WiFi controller(s) on the local network. Freezes the current thread for +- 1 second.

methods.name: RGBBrightnessDown()
methods.summary: Turns down the brightness of the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBBrightnessUp()
methods.summary: Turns up the brightness of the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBNextEffect()
methods.summary: Switches to the next effect of the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBPreviousEffect()
methods.summary: Switches to the previous effect of the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBSetColor(Color color)
methods.summary: Sets the color of the RGB bulb(s)/strips(s). Translates to hue, no brightness or saturation taken in consideration.

methods.name: RGBSetHue(float hue)
methods.summary: Sets the give hue of the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBSpeedDown()
methods.summary: Speeds down the current effect of the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBSpeedUp()
methods.summary: Speeds up the current effect of the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBSwitchOff()
methods.summary: Switches 'off' the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBSwitchOn()
methods.summary: Switch 'on' the RGB bulb(s)/strip(s)

methods.name: RGBWCycleMode(int group)
methods.summary: Switches the 'disco' mode of a group or all RGBW bulbs.

methods.name: RGBWSetBrightness(int group, int percentage)
methods.summary: Sets the brightness for a group or all RGBW bulbs.
methods.syntax: public void RGBWSetBrightness(int group, int percentage)
methods.linkedSyntax: public void RGBWSetBrightness(int group, int percentage)

methods.name: RGBWSetColor(int group, Color color)
methods.summary: Sets a group of RGBW bulbs to a realistic representation of the color by also setting the brightness of the bulbs and switching to white light when neccesary (very bright or very dull color).
methods.syntax: public void RGBWSetColor(int group, Color color)
methods.linkedSyntax: public void RGBWSetColor(int group, Color color)

methods.name: RGBWSetHue(int group, float hue)
methods.summary:
Sets a given group of RGBW bulbs to the specified hue.

MiLight bulbs do not support Saturation and Luminosity/Brightness. Use 'RGBSetColor' for a beter representation of the color.
methods.syntax: public void RGBWSetHue(int group, float hue)
methods.linkedSyntax: public void RGBWSetHue(int group, float hue)

methods.name: RGBWSetNightMode(int group)
methods.summary: Sets the 'Night' mode for the specified group or all RGBW bulbs.

methods.name: RGBWSpeedDown(int group)
methods.summary: Speeds down the current effect for a group or all RGBW bulbs.

methods.name: RGBWSpeedUp(int group)
methods.summary: Speeds up the current effect for a group or all RGBW bulbs.

methods.name: RGBWSwitchOff(int group)
methods.summary: Switches a specified group or all RGBW bulbs off.

methods.name: RGBWSwitchOn(int group)
methods.summary:
Switches a specified group of RGBW bulbs on. Can be used to link bulbs to a group (first time setup).

Linking can be done by sending this command within three seconds after powering a lightbulb up the first time (or when unlinked). It is advised however to link the lightbulbs the first time by using the MiLight phone app.

methods.name: RGBWSwitchWhite(int group)
methods.summary: Switches the specified group or all RGBW bulbs to white.

methods.name: WhiteBrightnessDown(int group)
methods.summary: Turns down the brightness for the specified group of white lightbulbs.

methods.name: WhiteBrightnessUp(int group)
methods.summary: Turns up the brightness for the specified group of white lightbulbs.

methods.name: WhiteCooler(int group)
methods.summary: Turns down the temperature of a group of white lights (cooler).

methods.name: WhiteSwitchOff(int group)
methods.summary: Switches 'off' one or all white lightbulbs.

methods.name: WhiteSwitchOn(int group)
methods.summary:
Switch 'on' one or all white lightbulbs. Can be used to link bulbs to a group (first time setup).

Linking can be done by sending this command within three seconds after powering a lightbulb up the first time (or when unlinked). It is advised however to link the lightbulbs the first time by using the MiLight phone app.

methods.name: WhiteWarmer(int group)
methods.summary: Turns up the temperature of a group of white lights (warmer).

properties.name: IP
properties.summary: Returns the IP address of this controller.
